title: Mutual Aid Sudan Portal
partner_forecast_note: This is for donors and partners to upload resource forecasting for the ERRs.
forgot_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
reset_email_sent: Password reset email has been sent!
check_email_instructions: Please check your email inbox and click on the reset link to set a new password.
reset_error: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.
reset_failed: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
invalid_link_instructions: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long
localization_hub_credit: Designed and developed by the Localization Hub for the Emergency Response Rooms
